description: Submission of details pursuant to the discharge of Condition 3 (materials) of Plot 12 Reserved Matters Application approval (LPA reference: 17/6662/RMA dated 28 February 2018 (as amended by 20/0362/NMA dated 7 February 2020, 20/1174/NMA dated 4 September 2020, 20/5694/NMA dated 1 April 2021, 21/5981/NMA dated 10 August 2022, 23/2212/NMA dated 4 August 2023 and 23/5028/NMA dated 19 January 2024) falling within Phase 1B (South) sub-phase of the Section 73 outline planning permission for the Brent Cross Cricklewood Regeneration Scheme reference F/04687/13 dated 23 July 2014. This discharge relates to detailed elements as follows; Plot 12S in relation to Balustrade and edge detail; Typical rainwater goods (section of gutter, downpipe etc.), and; Roofing materials, including roof parapets and overhangs to flats. Plot 12(S) & 12(N) as annotated; Roofing materials, including roof parapets and overhangs to flats (Plot 12 N); Typical rainwater goods (section of gutter, downpipe etc) (Plot 12 N); Sample areas of brickwork and mortar (retail facades, Plot 12 N & S); Areas of parking and paving (Plot 12 curtilage); Hard Landscaping areas (Plot 12 curtilage).
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
